languages.text: {n}Взгляд отказывается фокусироваться на размытой фигуре, пришедшей вам на помощь. Он вроде бы высок и... Разум решительно отказывается продолжать изучение, ибо каждое мгновение концентрации причиняет вам страдание.{/n}

{n}Your eyes refuse to focus on the blurry figure of the person who came to your aid. He appears to be tall, and... your mind emphatically refuses to continue, for every moment of concentration causes you suffering.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд отказывается фокусироваться на размытой фигуре, пришедшей вам на помощь. Он вроде бы высок и... Разум решительно отказывается продолжать изучение, ибо каждое мгновение концентрации причиняет вам страдание.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your eyes refuse to focus on the blurry figure that came to your aid. He appears to be tall, and... The mind emphatically refuses to continue, for every moment of concentration is causes you suffering.{/n}

languages.text: {n}救你命的人身影很模糊，你的目光无法集中在他身上。他的身材似乎很高大，而且……你的思想拒绝继续打量这个人。每当你专注地看着这个人时，你都会感到非常痛苦。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes refuse to focus on the blurry figure of the person who came to your aid. He appears to be tall, and... your mind emphatically refuses to continue, for every moment of concentration causes you suffering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}救你命的人身影很模糊，你的目光无法集中在他身上。他的身材似乎很高大，而且……你的思想拒绝继续打量这个人。每当你专注地看着这个人时，你都会感到非常痛苦。{/n}

languages.text: {n}手当てをした人物を見ようと目を凝らしても、焦点が合わない。背は高いように見えるが…意識を研ぎ澄まそうとするたびに身体が痛み、集中力が続かない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes refuse to focus on the blurry figure of the person who came to your aid. He appears to be tall, and... your mind emphatically refuses to continue, for every moment of concentration causes you suffering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}手当てをした人物を見ようと目を凝らしても、焦点が合わない。背は高いように見えるが…意識を研ぎ澄まそうとするたびに身体が痛み、集中力が続かない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tus ojos se niegan a enfocar la figura borrosa de la persona que ha acudido en tu ayuda. Parece ser alto y... tu mente rechaza con insistencia seguir examinándolo, ya que cada instante de concentración te causa un gran dolor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes refuse to focus on the blurry figure of the person who came to your aid. He appears to be tall, and... your mind emphatically refuses to continue, for every moment of concentration causes you suffering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus ojos se niegan a enfocar la figura borrosa de la persona que ha acudido en tu ayuda. Parece ser alto y... tu mente rechaza con insistencia seguir examinándolo, ya que cada instante de concentración te causa un gran dolor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vos yeux refusent de se focaliser sur la silhouette floue de l'individu qui vous a porté secours. Il a l'air grand et... Votre esprit résiste et vous empêche de poursuivre votre observation, chaque tentative de concentration ne vous apportant que souffrance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes refuse to focus on the blurry figure of the person who came to your aid. He appears to be tall, and... your mind emphatically refuses to continue, for every moment of concentration causes you suffering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos yeux refusent de se focaliser sur la silhouette floue de l'individu qui vous a porté secours. Il a l'air grand et... Votre esprit résiste et vous empêche de poursuivre votre observation, chaque tentative de concentration ne vous apportant que souffrance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Augen weigern sich, die verschwommene Gestalt zu fixieren, die dir geholfen hat. Sie scheint groß zu sein und ... dein Geist gibt auf, denn jeder Augenblick Konzentration bereitet dir Qual.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your eyes refuse to focus on the blurry figure of the person who came to your aid. He appears to be tall, and... your mind emphatically refuses to continue, for every moment of concentration causes you suffering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Augen weigern sich, die verschwommene Gestalt zu fixieren, die dir geholfen hat. Sie scheint groß zu sein und ... dein Geist gibt auf, denn jeder Augenblick Konzentration bereitet dir Qual.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gözlerin, yardımına gelen kişinin bulanık suretine odaklanmayı reddediyor. Uzun boylu birine benziyor ve... Konsantre olarak geçirdiğin her bir an bambaşka bir acı anlamına geldiği için, zihnin devam etmeyi kesin olarak reddediyor.{/n}
